title: PS5 System Update Details - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.29.21
description:
Tim and Janet breakdown the latest on the PS5 Beta update, Halo's Technical Preview, Kena's delay, and more trash from Activision Blizzard.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:34 - Housekeeping
A new Gamescast is up right now featuring Raven Simone aka Bobdunga. We talk all about lost games media and how she was able to recover a lost Mean Girls DS game. That episode is live right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services.
A new KFP w/ Jirard the Completionist
AFter this at 11AM on Twitch..tv/core or hosted here on Kinda Funny Core Multiverse Games with Greg Bless and Mike. Competing with Austin, Altano, Scoville, Bruce, Lawrence
Today at noon we’re reacting to that Annapurna Interactive Showcase, will we get more 12 minutes? Stray? Solar Ash? Tune in tomorrow to Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames to see our reactions.
The Roper Report  -
00:03:50 - Playdate PSAPlaydate PSA
00:06:47 - PS5 System Update Beta Adds 3D Audio for TV Speakers, Trophy Tracking, and More (Jared Moore at IGN)
00:25:30 - Kena: Bridge of Spirits Delayed until September 21st (Emberlab’s Twitter)
00:26:50 -The Ascent Reviews Are In
00:28:50 - Ad
00:32:08 - Halo Technical Preview Details (Halo Waypoint.com)
00:40:48 - Inside Blizzard Developers’ Infamous Bill ‘Cosby Suite’Booze, sexual remarks, and a giant portrait of Cosby are all at the center of Activision lawsuit (Ethan Gach at Kotaku)
00:52:30 - New Halloween Items Added In Latest Animal Crossing: New Horizons Update In Surprise Appearance (Justin at Animal Crossing World.com)
00:56:30 - Out today
00:58:05 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
 Greg and Blessing
